title: cmake[9890]: unhandled level 2 translation fault (11) at 0x00000250, esr 0x92000006
body_html:
I use python setup.py install

tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh: row 221:  9890 segfault               ${CMAKE_VERSION} .. ${CMAKE_GENERATOR} -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=$BUILD_TYPE -DBUILD_CAFFE2=OFF -DBUILD_ATEN=ON -DBUILD_PYTHON=OFF -DBUILD_BINARY=OFF -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=ON -DUSE_CUDA=$WITH_CUDA -DUSE_ROCM=$WITH_ROCM -DUSE_NNPACK=$WITH_NNPACK -DCUDNN_INCLUDE_DIR=$CUDNN_INCLUDE_DIR -DCUDNN_LIB_DIR=$CUDNN_LIB_DIR -DCUDNN_LIBRARY=$CUDNN_LIBRARY -DUSE_MKLDNN=$WITH_MKLDNN -DMKLDNN_INCLUDE_DIR=$MKLDNN_INCLUDE_DIR -DMKLDNN_LIB_DIR=$MKLDNN_LIB_DIR -DMKLDNN_LIBRARY=$MKLDNN_LIBRARY -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX="$INSTALL_DIR" -DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=1 -DCMAKE_C_FLAGS="$USER_CFLAGS" -DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS="$USER_CFLAGS" -DCMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS="$USER_LDFLAGS" -DCMAKE_SHARED_LINKER_FLAGS="$USER_LDFLAGS"
Failed to run 'bash tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh --with-nnpack caffe2 nanopb libshm gloo THD'

So I use dmesg
